definition: to meet/to see each other/CL:次[ci4]
to appear/also written 現|现[xian4]
to see/to meet/to appear (to be sth)/to interview
face/side/surface/aspect/top/classifier for flat surfaces such as drums, mirrors, flags etc
gift given to sb when meeting them for the first time
knowing sb by their reputation can't compare to meeting them in person (idiom)
pinyin: wen2 ming2 bu4 ru2 jian4 mian4

definition: meet and greet
to refuse to meet sb/to avoid sb

sentences.english: Mr Wei rushed to Taipei during his rest day on a Sunday to see Mr Zhang.
sentences.chinese: 魏姓同學便利用星期日趕到臺北和張先生見面。

sentences.english: AnShan tiger surveillance to meet with dao Yin CuiGuoHuan confidential and report to RenHui.
sentences.chinese: 安善虎監視到道賢跟崔國煥機密見面，彙報給仁惠。

sentences.english: Peter meets Yang Cheng for the second time.
sentences.chinese: 彼得與楊成第二次見面。

sentences.english: We should meet to talk over the party.
sentences.chinese: 我們得見見面，談談晚會的事。

sentences.english: Village work to get to meet with siew, he put away the resolution dove.
sentences.chinese: 中村功得以脫身去與蕭船見面，他決議除掉白鴿。

sentences.english: Oh, you could say that an old friend turned up and that you wanted to see her.
sentences.chinese: 哦，你可以說一位老朋友來了，你想跟她見見面。

sentences.english: Do not meet does not mean not miss, do not contact just to cover up nostalgic.
sentences.chinese: 䇓翱不見面不等於不思念，不聯絡只是爲了掩飾眷戀。

sentences.english: I'd like to make an appointment with him for a meeting these days.
sentences.chinese: 我想與他最近幾天內約個時間見見面。

sentences.english: I am writing to find out the possibility of our having a brief meeting some time next week…
sentences.chinese: 我去信詢問一下我們能否在下週某個時間見面。

sentences.english: MR. Yu would like to arrang an appointment with you.
sentences.chinese: 於先生想和你約個時間見面。

sentences.english: We get absorbed in discussion for several hours every time we meet.
sentences.chinese: 我們每次見面都會入彀地談上幾個小時。

sentences.english: Shall we meet at six this evening?
sentences.chinese: 我們今天晚上六點見面好嗎？

sentences.english: Until now it has met with no response. (See "Talks, first" page 48 report 77).
sentences.chinese: 到目前爲止，它沒有收到答覆見面。

sentences.english: Where did Borden and Sarah firstly meet?
sentences.chinese: 波登和莎拉首次見面是在哪裏？

sentences.english: In addition, the water Masataka Fukushima and media will also be a brief meeting.
sentences.chinese: 此外，清水正孝還會在福島與媒體做一個簡短見面。

sentences.english: Gary and I saw eair conditionersh other less and fewer.
sentences.chinese: 我和葛瑞相互見面的機會愈來愈少。
